Posted By: Towers76 (1/23/2013 9:05:56 AM)

posts.post_content:
She's pretty competitive I think; [Huntmaster of the Fells](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Huntmaster of the Fells) is a pretty decent power comparison:  
  
They're both four-drops, Huntmaster gives a token while Avenger has flying, Huntmaster *can* become a 4/4 while Avenger is a 3/3 that can effectively be a 6/3 with Battalion, they both give you life, etc.  
  
When you consider Huntmaster is a mythic and Avenger is a rare, she looks very solid.
posts.html:
She's pretty competitive I think; Huntmaster of the Fells is a pretty decent power comparison:

They're both four-drops, Huntmaster gives a token while Avenger has flying, Huntmaster can become a 4/4 while Avenger is a 3/3 that can effectively be a 6/3 with Battalion, they both give you life, etc.

When you consider Huntmaster is a mythic and Avenger is a rare, she looks very solid.

Posted By: TPmanW (1/27/2013 8:00:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I think she'll be interesting, but she'll have to compete with other prominent 4 drops. Resto angel stares her down without much concern they can still trade if you focus the helix eff on her, but that seems a little much. Huntmaster gives you a second creature and 2 life and he can deal 2 to your face and 2 to a monster with setup. I Think She'll need a fair amount of team support, curving into her with frontline medic is a decent idea. I REALLY wish she had haste, but I think that would push it over the edge into broken. Battalion is a little tricky, but I think the effect is powerful enough to go for it.
posts.html:

Huntmaster gives you a second creature and 2 life and he can deal 2 to your face and 2 to a monster with setup. Battalion is a little tricky, but I think the effect is powerful enough to go for it.

Posted By: endgame13 (1/27/2013 12:41:12 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This is a good card, and I like battalion, I just think it's way too slow for Boros. Boros is supposed to be all about promptness, and battallion doesn't do that, since you have to wait for all of your other tardy soldiers to show up. In this case it's at least possible for the battallion to be ready for the next turn, as opposed to [Boros Elite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boros Elite), barring some [Burning-Tree Emissary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burning-Tree Emissary)'s and [Legion Loyalist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Legion Loyalist)s
posts.html:
This is a good card, and I like battalion, I just think it's way too slow for Boros. Boros is supposed to be all about promptness, and battallion doesn't do that, since you have to wait for all of your other tardy soldiers to show up. In this case it's at least possible for the battallion to be ready for the next turn, as opposed to Boros Elite, barring some Burning-Tree Emissary's and Legion Loyalists

Posted By: Cyanide17 (1/26/2013 1:00:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Someone get this girl some Haste. 3 toughness is very weak to removal and dies to [Restoration Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Restoration Angel). On her own she's okay, but seems like more of a synergy card. I don't know what would be a good synergizer off the top of my head. [Silverblade Paladin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Silverblade Paladin) almost comes to mind but we still need speed. [Lightning Mauler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Mauler) has speed but we still don't have enough power to kill [Restoration Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Restoration Angel). I feel like this card is going to end up being a lot less prevalent in the top tables than some may think.
